channel.title: Future of Java on Simon's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Future of Java on Simon's Blog

item.title: Whats Next After Java 9
item.description:
With Java 9 out the door, you might wonder what the future holds for Java. I do too, so I had a quick look at current JEPs and Projects candidates to see what is looming ahead (you’ll get this joke in a second üòÅ).

In this article I will glance at the ones that stood out to me. Keep in mind most of these are not finalized, some are even just exploratory…

Without further ceremony, let’s dive in!
